name: Mi for Boobs 'em up
detailed_description:
Mi is a new personage for the game Boobs 'em up. She has sexy magnificent body. Do you think she has more chances to make a good career as a prostitute? Do you want to try how good she would be on the street?

This DLC content is available from the game, on the room where you select personages.

Born in Taoyuan, Taiwan, Mi has always wanted to become a veterinarian or lion tamer, she was a dreamer.

In second grade, Mi told everyone that she was leaving school before next semester to move to Hollywood to play Megan’s cousin from Vermont on Drake and Josh. At first she just told her best friend, but then the whole school found out. Mi had people coming up to her and asking her for autograph and a teacher even asked for a picture with her. When Mi showed up on the first day of school in third grade, she told everyone that the show was going off the air after the season finished (even though she has no knowledge of when it was ending), and so they wouldn’t need her. AND THE SHOW ENDED AFTER THAT SEASON AND EVERYONE BELIEVED HER UP UNTIL LIKE 6TH GRADE, BUT NOW HER BEST FRIEND WILL NEVER LET HER FORGET ABOUT IT AND SHE'S SO ANGRY. But on the other side this is a very funny story.

Mi loves to imagine that she is living a different life every day.

Help Mi to take her place on the street!

short_description: Mi is a new personage for the game Boobs 'em up
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Bulgarian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Greek, Hungarian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese, Romanian, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Swedish, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 8 or later
  • Processor: 2 GHz processor or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX compatible video card with at least 512 VRAM
  • Storage: 1 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.5 or later
  • Processor: Intel 2 GHz processor or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible video card with at least 128 VRAM
  • Storage: 1 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 LTS (or similar, Debian-based distro)
  • Processor: 2 GHz processor or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible video card
  • Storage: 1 MB available space
